name: OpenTilt
body:
No documentation yet. Stay tuned.

Requirements:
* Arduino Nano v3
* Arduino Uno bootloader (optiboot)
* MMA7361
* nRF24l01+
* RF24 fork at https://github.com/gcopeland/RF24
* AcceleroMMA7361 at https://code.google.com/p/mma7361-library/
* Entropy at http://code.google.com/p/avr-hardware-random-number-generation/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
